name: Christmas Haste XD
description:
Aliens do exist...

And it's Christmas time on Earth!  Can you help Puff-Puff in collecting Christmas trees for his son Jeffery while moving towards the top of the tower where he resides?

Watch out for slippery ice platforms. And hurry up! Time and speed are your biggest enemies. 

Note for players-Even if you reach the top, there's no guarantee that you will win. A surprise awaits you!

Suggestions for improving this prototype are always welcome!
